com.kuka.roboticsAPI.controllerModel.mock
Class LBRKinematic

java.lang.Object
  com.kuka.roboticsAPI.controllerModel.mock.LBRKinematic

public final class LBRKinematic
extends java.lang.Object

Helper class to calculate a simple forward and inverse kinematics value for a LBR.

USE THIS CLASS ONLY FOR SIMULATION!

Method Detail

getForwardKinematicAlpha

public static double getForwardKinematicAlpha(double jnt1,
                                              double jnt2,
                                              double jnt3,
                                              double jnt4)
Calculates the alpha-forward kinematics. Joint Positions for the first four joints are required.

Parameters:
jnt1 - Joint position axis 1 (in radians)
jnt2 - Joint position axis 2 (in radians)
jnt3 - Joint position axis 3 (in radians)
jnt4 - Joint position axis 4 (in radians)
Returns:
the alpha angle corresponding to the given joint values.

Parameters:
jnt1In - Joint 1.
jnt2In - Joint 2.
jnt3In - Joint 3.
jnt4In - Joint 4.
jnt5In - Joint 5.
jnt6In - Joint 6.
jnt7In - Joint 7.
Returns:
The forward kinematic value.

jnt4In - Joint 4.
jnt5In - Joint 5.
